item.description:
"Le Beaujolais nouveau est arriv√©!"

When Beaujolais Nouveau arrives, you know it's the start of the holiday season. The Boston Wine School is teaming up with the folks from Georges Duboeuf to host a "Sip & Mingle" party to welcome Nouveau back this year. The party is going to feature both Beaujolais Nouveau and other Beaujolais wines for you to get to know while you munch on some tasty French cheeses, exotic antipasto, artisan breads, and other light hors d'oeuvres. Kick the season off right! Taste the new Nouveau and meet people who love wine and food just like you do.

Tickets
item.name: Beaujolais Sip & Mingle Party
